Name: Redesign Homepage Hero Section
Notes: Create a modern eye-catching hero section with animated gradient background and clear CTA buttons.

Name: Landing Page A/B Testing
Notes: Set up A/B tests for the new landing page variants with Optimizely integration.

Name: Database Schema Migration v2
Notes: Migrate from legacy schema to new normalized structure with zero downtime.

Name: Performance Optimization - Initial Load
Notes: Reduce initial page load time from 4.2s to under 2s using code splitting and lazy loading.

Name: User Authentication Refactor
Notes: Refactor authentication to use OAuth 2.0 with PKCE flow for improved security.

Name: Mobile Responsive Navigation
Notes: Create responsive hamburger menu with smooth animations for mobile devices.

Name: Fix Authentication Session Bug
Notes: Critical bug in session handling causing intermittent logouts. Fixed with mutex lock and session refresh.

Name: Email Template System
Notes: Created reusable email template system with MJML for transactional emails.

Name: CI/CD Pipeline Setup
Notes: Set up GitHub Actions for automated testing linting and deployment to staging.

Name: API Rate Limiting Implementation
Notes: Implemented token bucket rate limiting for all API endpoints.

Name: Dark Mode Theme Support
Notes: Added system-aware dark mode with CSS custom properties.

Name: User Profile Image Upload
Notes: Implemented image upload with S3 storage and automatic resizing.

Name: API Documentation Overhaul
Notes: Comprehensive API documentation with interactive examples using OpenAPI/Swagger.

Name: Security Audit & Penetration Testing
Notes: Comprehensive security audit including OWASP Top 10 review and penetration testing.

Name: Mobile App Beta Launch
Notes: Prepare and launch mobile app beta on TestFlight and Google Play internal testing.

Name: Analytics Dashboard Implementation
Notes: Build comprehensive analytics dashboard with charts and real-time data.

Name: Internationalization (i18n) Setup
Notes: Set up i18n framework with support for English Spanish and French.

Name: Payment Integration - Stripe
Notes: Integrate Stripe for subscription payments with webhook handling.

Name: Real-time Notifications System
Notes: WebSocket-based real-time notification system with push notification support.

Name: Search Functionality Enhancement
Notes: Implement full-text search with Elasticsearch and auto-complete suggestions.

Name: User Onboarding Flow
Notes: Create interactive onboarding wizard with progress tracking.

Name: Accessibility Audit WCAG 2.1
Notes: Audit and fix accessibility issues to meet WCAG 2.1 AA compliance.

Name: Error Monitoring Integration
Notes: Set up Sentry for error tracking and performance monitoring.

Name: Automated Backup System
Notes: Implement automated daily backups with point-in-time recovery.

Name: Load Testing Suite
Notes: Create comprehensive load testing suite with k6 for API endpoints.

Name: Component Library Documentation
Notes: Document all UI components with Storybook and usage examples.

Name: Two-Factor Authentication
Notes: Implement TOTP-based two-factor authentication with backup codes.

Name: Data Export Feature
Notes: Allow users to export their data in CSV and JSON formats for GDPR compliance.

Name: WebSocket Connection Pooling
Notes: Optimize WebSocket connections with connection pooling for better scalability.

Name: Image Optimization Pipeline
Notes: Implement automatic image optimization with WebP conversion and responsive sizes.
